sig_info: M.O.D.O.K. gains +16.45 to 102.06 Block Proficiency for each Class defeated within the same Quest, plus a unique Block bonus for subsequent fights against that Class.
Mutant: Reduce 1.06 to 16.19% Special Attack damage.
Tech: Gain 1.04 to 5.04% Power when struck.
Cosmic: Reduce 1.04 to 5.04% damage for each unique Buff on the enemy.
Mystic: Steal 1.04 to 5.04% Power when struck.
Science: Reduce 1.04 to 5.04% damage for each unique Debuff active.
Skill: Why bother? They’re not even superhuman!

FLUX PASSIVE: M.O.D.O.K.’s attributes fluctuate throughout the fight in a complex and seemingly unpredictable manner. It would take a super-genius to calculate the pattern…
FORCE FIELD PASSIVE: Start the fight with 1 Force Field charge(s), each Auto-Blocking one attack with +139.13 Block Proficiency. Force Fields do not count as Well-Timed Blocks and therefore cannot trigger Parry.
Once depleted, Force Field charges replenish after 7 second(s).
As long as a Force Field is active, Opponent's Ability Power Rate is reduced by up to 100% based on Flux.
If M.O.D.O.K. is not Stunned, Force Field is removed when he is struck.
PASSIVE: Force Field recharges 0.8 second(s) faster for each alive Champion on the enemy team.
ALL ATTACKS: Every 7th attack is guaranteed to be Critical, but Critical Rating is ignored.
HEAVY ATTACKS: 40% chance to Incinerate for 50.4 damage over 4 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Enemy abilities that grant Power or Health are reversed for the duration of this attack. Up to 150% of what they would have gained is lost instead.
This attack does not generate any Power for opponents.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 60% chance to inflict Bleed for 50.4 damage over 6 seconds.
Bleed duration is increased by up to 100% based on Flux.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Each rocket has an 70% chance to inflict a random non-unique Debuff.

FLUX PASSIVE: M.O.D.O.K.’s attributes fluctuate throughout the fight in a complex and seemingly unpredictable manner. It would take a super-genius to calculate the pattern…
FORCE FIELD PASSIVE: Start the fight with 1 Force Field charge(s), each Auto-Blocking one attack with +178.26 Block Proficiency. Force Fields do not count as Well-Timed Blocks and therefore cannot trigger Parry.
Once depleted, Force Field charges replenish after 7 second(s).
As long as a Force Field is active, Opponent's Ability Power Rate is reduced by up to 100% based on Flux.
If M.O.D.O.K. is not Stunned, Force Field is removed when he is struck.
PASSIVE: Force Field recharges 0.8 second(s) faster for each alive Champion on the enemy team.
ALL ATTACKS: Every 7th attack is guaranteed to be Critical, but Critical Rating is ignored.
HEAVY ATTACKS: 40% chance to Incinerate for 1042.8 damage over 4 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Enemy abilities that grant Power or Health are reversed for the duration of this attack. Up to 150% of what they would have gained is lost instead.
This attack does not generate any Power for opponents.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 60% chance to inflict Bleed for 1042.8 damage over 6 seconds.
Bleed duration is increased by up to 100% based on Flux.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Each rocket has an 70% chance to inflict a random non-unique Debuff.
